### [City News](https://www.cowtx.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?CID=1)

1. [![Trashupdate](https://www.cowtx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=20412)](https://www.cowtx.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=909)

   #### [Frontier Waste Trash Collection Update Due to Weather](https://www.cowtx.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=909)

   Due to recent weather delays, Frontier Waste Solutions will collect household trash only this week. Bulk, brush, and recycling services are suspended, and routes are expected to be completed by Saturday.
   [Read on...
   about Frontier Waste Trash Collection Update Due to Weather](https://www.cowtx.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=909)

1. [![Winter Weather Update](https://www.cowtx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=20409)](https://www.cowtx.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=907)

   #### [City of Watauga Facilities Closed and Civil Service Meeting Canceled Tuesday, January 27](https://www.cowtx.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=907)

   Winter Weather Update
   City facilities were scheduled to open at noon today, Jan. 27. Due to continued unsafe road conditions, City facilities will remain closed today to ensure the safety of our staff and residents. Civil Service meeting is also canceled.
   [Read on...
   about City of Watauga Facilities Closed and Civil Service Meeting Canceled Tuesday, January 27](https://www.cowtx.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=907)

[View All
City News](https://www.cowtx.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?CID=1)

1. [EVENTS](https://www.cowtx.org/#tab0a1e195a-a9c1-4d7a-91c4-447d0a8ece4e_1)

1. #### [Teen Fiber Arts Social Club](https://www.cowtx.org/Calendar.aspx?EID=16190)

   Hey teens! Bring a project so you can crochet, knit, sew, embroider, or cross-stitch with friends at the library!
   Please note: This is a social club, so there is no guarantee that someone in attendance can teach you.
   [Teen Fiber Arts Social Club
   Read On](https://www.cowtx.org/Calendar.aspx?EID=16190)

1. #### [Storytime Toddlers 10AM & Preschoolers 11AM](https://www.cowtx.org/Calendar.aspx?EID=16385)

   Join us at Watauga Public Library for different storytimes on Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday! See photo below for the target age group for each storytime.
   [Storytime Toddlers 10AM & Preschoolers 11AM
   Read On](https://www.cowtx.org/Calendar.aspx?EID=16385)

1. #### [Music & Movement Storytime](https://www.cowtx.org/Calendar.aspx?EID=16392)

   Join us at Watauga Public Library for different storytimes on Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday! See photo below for the target age group for each storytime.
   [Music & Movement Storytime
   Read On](https://www.cowtx.org/Calendar.aspx?EID=16392)

[VIEW ALL](https://www.cowtx.org/calendar.aspx?CID=26,29)
